thread.title: BRIEF-Public Service Enterprise Says CEO Ralph Izzo's 2017 Total Compensation Was $10.6 Mln

title: BRIEF-Public Service Enterprise Says CEO Ralph Izzo's 2017 Total Compensation Was $10.6 Mln

organizations.name: reuters) - public service enterprise group inc

text: March 13, 2018 / 3:42 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Public Service Enterprise Says CEO Ralph Izzo's 2017 Total Compensation Was $10.6 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 13 (Reuters) - Public Service Enterprise Group Inc : * PUBLIC SERVICE ENTERPRISE GROUP SAYS CHAIRMAN AND CEO RALPH IZZO'S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $10.6 MILLION VERSUS $9.9 MILLION IN FY 2016 - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2tJpIky ) Further company coverage:
